item.title: Example post from the long list
item.description: This is the place that will host my resume as well as a blog with several posts about anything that may come on my mind (such as the hell I passed through to setup this simple website).

item.title: WhoAmI
item.description: My name is Christos and I am the creator of this website. My cv as well as some information abut my open source contributions will lie here
